title: Cinefantastique Vol 04 No 1 (Spring 1975)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Includes articles on Forbidden Planet, Night of the Living Dead, 2001: A Space Odyssey, Once, Kolchak: The Night Stalker, an interview with Christopher Lee for The Man with the Golden Gun, movie reviews and news.
